questions.question: What is the dominant color of the text on the packaging?
What is the overall shape of the product's packaging?
What material appears to be used for the product's packaging?
What is the primary message conveyed by the large text on the packaging?
What is printed immediately below the main text statement?
What is listed as an ingredient that is specifically NOT added?
What is the second ingredient explicitly stated as NOT added?
Is the text on the packaging predominantly uppercase or lowercase?
What is the font style of the printed text (e.g., sans-serif)?
Describing the texture of the packaging, is it glossy or matte?
What is the third ingredient explicitly stated as NOT added?
Does the packaging include any visible barcodes or QR codes?
What is the color of the lines separating the listed ingredients?
What is the fourth ingredient explicitly stated as NOT added?
Considering the overall design, is the packaging minimalistic or elaborate?
